website_summaries.verdict: A durable classic for good reason.
pros: Retro, 1950s-style glass cake stand and dome
cons: Some find the lid heavy to lift

customer_reviews.title: Is it really Anchor Hocking?
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved these plates today, they are in good condition and look nice, but are labeled MAINSTAYS from WALMART. Does this mean they are not Anchor Hocking? Or is it that Anchor Hocking is the glass manufacturer only? I have bought other Anchor Hocking plates that were labeled as such. Not sure if these plates will meet my quality and safety standards if they are not actually Anchor Hocking glass as advertised. Has this happened to anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Poor advertisement
customer_reviews.text: Plates seem to be okay quality. I ordered these plates and bowls because the add said made in USA by Anchor Hocking. The plates I received are from Libby and made in Mexico. Not at all happy with that. All 12 bowls have imperfection/tooling marks in them, looks like streaks in the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Plate shattered when microwaving food
customer_reviews.text: was reheating some food I'd purchased from whole foods and the plate broke in half and was very hot. to my knowledge glass should not get hot when microwaved just the food. I understand the hot food could heat the glass through conduction but in my decades of microwaving food on microwavable plates I have never had one overheat and break in half. It's a shame when you but something made in USA and get junk instead of a superior product.
customer_reviews.author: Roknor

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, good quality - looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to display a desert, and I love that it can be flipped around and turned into a punch bowl!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: ... these plates from my bridal shower and they were awesome. These quality is different
customer_reviews.text: 4 hrs ago I got a set of these plates from my bridal shower and they were awesome. These quality is different. They arrived, 3 of the plates were not even, the glass looked like it melted in the sun or something. How in the world do you have this with brand new plates? I guess I just realized this brand is not the same anymore. It’s shocking to see the quality that came in the mail. Returning!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Magsanide

customer_reviews.title: Classic "diner" domes cake plate with 3+ other functions!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I admit I bought this one because it doesn't have a "lip" so it would be easy to cut, but I didn't read the review well. This product is amazing. I feel like it should be as "As Seen On TV" item. It is a domed cake plate, trifle bowl, punch bowl and chip and dip plus maybe even more uses I am just discovering. Very substantial and I love seeing my cakes and cupcakes on the counter. Looks like the domed displays in every diner in New England!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous Glass
customer_reviews.text: Update2019: One has broken already. It slipped out of my hand and fell 2 inches, hit sink and broke into razor sharp pieces. These are not safe for kitchen use. Cleanup took over an hour. Very dangerous. See photo. Dec2018:They are NOT a value for the money. 5 out of 12 had many air bubbles in the glass. Air bubble lead to cracking. 2 out of 12 had blemished sides. Again, not worth any value as the quality control is not there.
customer_reviews.author: F T. A.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trifle bowl. Can be used for so much more than trifles. I’ve used it as a fruit bowl, display for a candy bar, a center piece, etc... Sturdy and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Conlon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality control
customer_reviews.text: I received extremely low quality plates that where all defective. I understand that this is a glass product and imperfections are expected but this quality control is unacceptable. I have a plate that's lopsided, hard material imbedded in the plate, almost all plates are chiped on the side, and every plate has an indent in a random part of the center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice. Will have to see how it works out in the long run. I'm using it for pequins and vinegar. Be aware though that this DOES NOT HAVE A GLASS STOPPER. The stopper is a glass top with a plastic seal. Five stars other than that, but four as is. I wish I could give 3.5 stars. Not a fan of the plastic stopper.
customer_reviews.author: Norm Koger

customer_reviews.title: Made in America. Lead-free glass. That's all I ...
customer_reviews.text: Made in America. Lead-free glass. That's all I ever wanted in a dish.
customer_reviews.author: Max Eppstein

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful plates..excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative reviews I was doubtful about ordering these but when they arrived well packed and displaying the American Union label I was delighted. They are high quality for the price and exactly the right size for sandwiches, cake,etc., There are NO imperfections in the glass and no jagged pieces. Each one has the Made in USA label on the bottom which removes easily. Very happy will purchase more items.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful piece. I bought it for my granddaughter who wanted a cake plate with a dome. Before I gave it to her I inspected it and it was flawless, a very sold piece. An additional bonus is when the plate portion is inverted and set on a table upside down, the dome cover will fit into the hollow portion of the stand so it can be used as a punch bowl. Wonderful versatility! She loved this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Kathy

customer_reviews.title: what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my strawberry shortcake trifle. Good size and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Maria Victoria

customer_reviews.title: So happy
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one of these. I wasn't sure about ordering this from online but when it arrived, I LOVE IT. No more wasting plastic bags and having them be all messy from icing on the counter top. So far things have stayed fresh including cakes or cookies that I leave in there that my roommate or friends munch on here and there. This is great, and looks prettier like a display even when empty. I'm glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Glass Plates Arrived in Same Oversized Box With 28 Pound Litter (Without Padding)
customer_reviews.text: Wow - glass plates bouncing around in box with litter? Somehow only 1 plate chipped which we only found out after cutting my companion. Not OK! All plates had littles scratches on them but not too noticeable. Plate quality seem good. One reason I continue to hesitate using Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Beware glass powder and shards in plastic cap after little use.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic on stopper hides design flaw in the apparently cheap glass. The glass when formed was not closed so the stopper hides a thin, unclosed conical section that crumbled into grit and shards inside the plastic cap which I could see when the upper half of the stopper came out leaving the cruet plugged. Typical honey and maple syrup in cruets and both stoppers disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: shawno

customer_reviews.title: Good but pours a bit fast
customer_reviews.text: I got this and another cruet (Chef's Planet 8-Ounce Glass Cruet) since I didn't know which I would prefer. What this one has going for it is that it has a stopper that allows you to close the cruet and not have an air-exchange when not in use. What I dislike about this cruet is that it pours quickly and it is hard to control the amount of oil (or whatever) that is poured out. In contrast the Chef's Planet 8-oz glass cruet drizzles oil very slowly which I love. The only negative about the chef's planet is that it always allows air to move in/out of the cruet through the small opening.
customer_reviews.author: Szu

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control, could be a great piece
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to see the poor quality control on this product. I searched how and low for the right piece and it arrives with this clear manufacturing defect.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: really nice for oil based things
customer_reviews.text: lid closes securely so its safe to shake up olive oil with herbs in it. lovely elegant profile. pours well and at an easy to control rate. nice little elevated line in the glass on the handle so its very easy to grip when you pour. no doubt it might be annoying to clean, but the bottles with wider neck openings just slop stuff all over. when i have had to clean things with a narrow neck like this before, i just let them stew for a day with dish detergent solution, filling it to the brim and get out the brush after it sits a while. love it.
customer_reviews.author: fern

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plates
customer_reviews.text: My plates arrived well packaged and they're all perfect. They're heavier than I expected, but I suppose that's good, makes them less breakable. I picked them for their simplicity so they won't compete with other visually busy stuff on the table. Also after watching a how-to youtube video I plan to try to decoupage a couple of them on the underside with fancy napkins and ribbons. The simple design will make that easier.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Marie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I was worried that some of the plates would arrive damaged due to other reviews, but all of mine were in tact. A few have bubbles or other imperfections, but still serve their function just fine. We have used these in the microwave and have not had any issues with cracks or breakage. Same applies to the dishwasher. We've had the plates for months and they have gone through many dishwasher cycles with no trouble. Overall, I feel like these plates were a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Cruet!
customer_reviews.text: This small cruet is perfect for family or formal dining and brings back the memory of our family table when I was a child. The bright, clear glass with a golden liquid ready to pour is so attractive, and the glass stopper is beautiful. It came extremely well packaged and in a timely manner. I would recommend this glassware piece to anyone as an example of beauty and hospitality!
customer_reviews.author: Lola Lavy

customer_reviews.title: bad packing...good luck
customer_reviews.text: Nice bowl for the money. Only got 1 star for sturdiness because it showed up in 2 pieces . Figured that wasnt to bad because the box looked like it had been tossed arond pretty good ! Bowl was not broken , so I just gorilla glued the base back to the bowl and it seems to be holding ok . I would not order again just based on the packaging . Think I got lucky it wasnt all busted up.
customer_reviews.author: briant

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA and mostly glass
customer_reviews.text: My sister-in-law said she wanted a platter like mine that had multiple slots and places for a dip so when I saw this liking the interlocking I wanted to give it a try gave it to her for gift and she just loved it the deviled egg tray is huge holds lots of eggs made very well nice have a glass the inserts are plastic and made very well as well
customer_reviews.author: snoopy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice -- I am glad to heat food in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice -- I am glad to heat food in the microwave knowing there is no lead or cadmium that might leach out of my dinnerware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Serving Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely, heavy, glass set. I love that it is three separate pieces so you can also use the tiers as cake plates or use two at a time. It is sturdy enough that you can stack the smallest tier in the middle, but obviously you should be cautious with what you're putting on it when you mix up the sizes. I am really happy with this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Economical purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Not uneven, no problems in microwave, dishwasher etc like the other reviews. Glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Somethingbrilliant

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bowl
customer_reviews.text: I made a layered jello in this bowl and it was the hit of the party. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: After my decades old vinegar cruet finally broke, I was forced to look for another one. While this one is not as sturdy as my old one, it is still well made. It is also a very pretty piece, more so than I would have expected. I haven’t had it long enough to speak about its longevity, but so far I’m very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: meowsermom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my teenagers mouthwash. They are perfect and almost half a large bottle of mouthwash fits in one of these. My teenagers love them, it motivates them to use mouthwash more often. They are also easy to clean and pour, plus it keeps the mouthwash covered. My teenagers pour the mouthwash in some vintage shot glasses and they have no dripping problems. Great product...I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sol

customer_reviews.title: functionality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased three of these cruets. I use them for of the Holy Oils displayed in my chapel. They look great and didn't cost nearly as much as those available from a church supply company.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: Medium side good size for what we should be eating. The bigger the plate the bigger the portion so this is smaller then regular. I’m happy with the size. I’ve had for around a month. I haven’t broke mine and they clean good.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Blancheteau

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite finds
customer_reviews.text: These work so well for some of the cake orders we do that have a small cake on top with cupcake below. They're simple but elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: The price was right
customer_reviews.text: Use both work great and I only have cereal bowl broke so when I saw these I ordered them immediately and they came rather quickly.. I use them daily for cereal fruit bowl soup. They hold 16 1/2 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Mr helpful

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for these for a long time. They're great for homemade dressings. They're very well made. Note: the stopper is just one piece so no need to try and take it apart when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product - Sturdy and Going Strong after 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 3 years now and I can't complain about a single thing. The cake stand seals so tight that whatever you put in it will stay moist for a long time. I was shocked about how well my pastries kept. It's also the perfect size and has adorned my counter top for a while. The lid is nice and heavy and I've never had any issue with cracking or anything.
customer_reviews.author: Mariam Shahamat

customer_reviews.title: cake holder
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my second replacement, I accidently dropped the lid on the floor so kept the bottom piece for a stand for fruit or something, ordered it again it showed up in a million pieces, took a chance and returned the broken one and reorder, it was fine, I lOVe this cake holder, classy touch, but I think they should use extra padding to ship <Bubble wrap one layer will not prevent it from breaking if delivery people are not careful and extra brown paper thrown in the box does not give it cushion to prevent it from breaking!, Find something better to insulate it from breaking when shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cake plate but.....
customer_reviews.text: I used this for two 9 inch layers but discovered that the diameter of the domed lid is to tight to add cake decorations. If you put anything around the border on bottom of cake, it will be squished by the lid. It should be at least two inches wider and there is plenty of room on the plate to accommodate the additional diameter. This is just a precaution. If it doesn't matter to you about decorations it is a very nice cake plate.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Trifle dish
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as I was hoping for. Perfect for trifle!!
customer_reviews.author: KAREN M LEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - buy some!
customer_reviews.text: They are just as promised and in use in my home every day. They will line your dainty china or decorative plate or you can enjoy them just on their own - they fit any type meal and if you trouble to give them a buffing with the town to bring up a company shine, the look at any table if fine.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Shopper Lady

customer_reviews.title: 0 for 12...New design, same defects.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, thought the new design would correct old problems. What a wrong assumption! I like Anchor products, but these plates have no quality control to speak of. I don't know if it's a production issue, or if Amazon customers are getting the reject pile at this price. I ordered two boxes of 6, 12 plates total. Each one had a flaw, ranging from jagged edges, bubbles, embedded lines; and scuffs on every plate. The packaging was satisfactory. The contents were not. 30 pounds of glass, I now have to carry to the UPS store. Just save yourself the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Metin Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Trifle Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice trifle bowl. It is thick glass and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Myt

customer_reviews.title: Great Versatality!
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a cake stand with cover, and this fits the bill.Or I can use it as a punch bowl. Or I can use just the cake stand to elevate food on a buffet. So versatile! I would have given it 5 stars, but the set is so heavy! I know that the weight is in the product description, but it is heavy for a small, older lady to lift and carry.
customer_reviews.author: SC Girl

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered, but arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I wanted, but, I purchased 36, and in each case of 12, at least 2 arrived broken. I needed 30 for an event, and only had 29. I would order again, but they need to be packed/wrapped better.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Morris

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them.
customer_reviews.text: While I like the design of these and they seem sturdy they are actually really fragile. Several have chipped. Some have cracked in the dishwasher and some in the microwave. I have glass plates and bowls from the same company from 11 years ago that are great. These ones? Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorbabes

customer_reviews.title: Salad dressing cruet
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. Its a good size. The stopper top was slightly askew and there was a "lip" of the material sticking out. Its not glass but a hard plastic. I was able to file it down with a sturdy nail file and now it is usable.
customer_reviews.author: Snowdiva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for a friend. She loved it. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: H. MOSLEY

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to bake a cake!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the price point had me at "cheeeaap", but the unboxing had me like helloooo Betty Crocker. The weight of the dish is solid...no, like $150.00 quality and "they don't make 'em like this anymore" solid. If you have a cake you wanna display...this is the display case for it. A real beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Rellie

customer_reviews.title: Product not as shown in photo. :(
customer_reviews.text: The product delivered is not the product show . I loved the high base with sleek pedestal. What was sent is very short pedestal with squatty and fat base. Nothing elegant or sleek about it. Really disappointed. Has same dome top but the base ruined the entire thing.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Lasater

customer_reviews.title: Nice dishes, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great dishes. I'm so tired of having to replace a whole set of dishes because we need new bowls, or plates, etc. I've started just buying clear dishes so they always match and I can just replace the pieces I need. These dishes are great. Well made, good size, and they fit well in the dish washer.
customer_reviews.author: L Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great cereal and soup sized.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and perfect size for soup and cereal. Not too small and perfect for the microwave. We have used for a few weeks and washed in the dishwasher and have had no chips or breaks like my pottery ones I replaced and I have teenagers that are hard on dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I wanted glass plates because they are easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I wanted glass plates because they are easy to clean, always look good and have no chemicals to give off. These are a bit small but otherwise I am quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but VERY HEAVY.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Well made and delivered quickly without a scratch. The cover is very heavy. I'm afraid the kids will break it while grabbing a goodie. That said, they haven't broken it yet. It works flawlessly as a punch bowl. If it were any more delicate, that would not be the case. Overall, well made and exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: I.M. Hectic

customer_reviews.title: Great cake tower
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE this piece! Even when we don't have a cake on display we keep it out on the counter because it's so beautiful. The glass is thick and quite heavy. Very durable sturdy piece. You can't go wrong with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I know Anchor Hocking to have quality products. The glass bowls I received were in an unmarked box and no brand identification in the packaging. The bowls were of poor quality with obvious defects (manufacturing/tooling) marks in the glass giving it a streaked look and texture. I believe the bowls I received were a knockoff and not actual anchor hocking products. I returned these to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in one piece
customer_reviews.text: Somehow it arrived without being broken, despite the lack of any suitable packing material. Shipped in a simple cardboard box, single layer. Guess that is a testament to the durability. Good product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Scottso111

customer_reviews.title: Had a crack in the rim, piece of glass broke off - cheap product, would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the negative reviews. It looks nice, but is cheaply made. It arrived with a crack in the rim. I took a chance and used it, but a piece of glass broke off, so I recycled it.
customer_reviews.author: ARW

customer_reviews.title: Great Plates
customer_reviews.text: These plates are really sturdy. I have a bunch of high school kids using them and no breaking so far. That is a miracle in itself. I also like how the plates are clear and go with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: UNBREAKABLE WOW
customer_reviews.text: I dropped one of these plates on my CEMENT patio and was already thinking about how I had to clean all the broken glass, but to my surprised it bounce like a ball and landed upside down without breaking at all, damn I was so impressed and happy
customer_reviews.author: THE DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Easy, clean, and simple.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a set of ceramic dishes and from time to time there would be some brown syrupy looking stuff leaching from the bowls. Enough of that. We bought a set from Anchor Hocking. They look great. Are not fragile. I like them a lot better that anything else I’ve had before. Clear glass dishes. Easy, clean, and simple.
customer_reviews.author: JJacobson

customer_reviews.title: Not shatterproof but well designed to keep eggs fresh.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. The first one was fully loaded before dinner guests arrived. There were 24 very nice looking egg halves, which apparently smelled good to my dog. He dragged the dish off onto his head. They are not shatterproof, I can tell you that. But they are well designed and allow iced service of very perishable deviled eggs.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Witt

customer_reviews.title: A True Bargain!
customer_reviews.text: The two cruets were very carefully packed and arrived promptly and undamaged. They are simple but attractive and the perfect size for olive oil and balsamic vinegar. I particularly like the plastic coating around the stopper bases, which holds them firmly in place without detracting from the cruets' appearance. Other more expensive cut crystal cruets I've owned without etching or similar coating around the stopper base don't seal firmly, and the stopper doesn't sit straight and can fall out when the cruets are moved. Not a problems with these.
customer_reviews.author: B. White

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it as a mouthwash holder in the bathroom! I would say it’s a 4 star product just because there were blemishes in the glass, but they won’t be noticeable unless someone is really inspecting the piece. The piece itself is sturdy and i feel confident that it will last for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Minor defect
customer_reviews.text: This was very well made, however, the cover does not sit evenly on the base, so it has a small opening on one side of it where small insects can pass through. I can’t exchange it because I did not inspect it when I just got it. I had it sitting in the box until I was ready to use it. I’m NEVER doing that again. The overall quality is fantastic though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A deviled egg server and then some.
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this tray. Bought it for deviled eggs, always a crowd pleaser and holidays coming up. I'm looking forward to using the under-bowl to hold crushed ice and seasonal evergreens to dress up the presentation. I like that I can use it as well for veggie dips and such on other occasions. I usually avoid bringing in any more pantry stuff, too many things in the kitchen taking up too much space. But there have been so many occasions that I was frustrated about those darned eggs slipping around on a lettuce bed, I thought it was about time. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: avid rita

customer_reviews.title: Dent in the glass
customer_reviews.text: Every one in the box had a "dent" in the center of the glass. The same place on every plate.
customer_reviews.author: D-Dub

customer_reviews.title: These are a good solid weight
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised when these arrive. Heavier weight than I anticipated but they do not look clunky. Perfect back up dishes/extra place settings because they coordinate with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity Grace

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heavy cake stand
customer_reviews.text: As I want to match with my cake crystal cupcake stands I bought this and this is heavy and looks great. It will hold my 2 tier cake pretty well for my baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: Good except one!
customer_reviews.text: Out of 12 plates- one was chipped on the edge. Requesting a replacement for one plate. Otherwise good quality. Arrived quickly. I was actually surprised more weren’t chipped - they arrived in a flimsy bubble wrap bag with thick brow paper in between each but not much keeping the 12 plates from sliding around in the box
customer_reviews.author: S Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Great little cruet that's not just for vinegar and oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store lemon juice so I can juice several and be able to easily pour it into a cup or glass. This works beautifully for that. Of course it is also good for vinegar, oil, basically anything you want. It is well made, easy to clean with a small brush and the lid fits tightly. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Can have 3 layer cake in. Lid is very heavy; it’s thick glass.
customer_reviews.author: Kiddo

customer_reviews.title: It is wobbly
customer_reviews.text: I wish I didn't throw the box away so i could return it. The top does not fit the base with out wobbling. Its kinda cheap feeling. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: The Loft Audio

customer_reviews.title: beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally take the time to right reviews on things I purchase, but this cake cover is beautiful...and the price was great....I'm not surprised some people recieved broken items. It came in a box four times it's size without any packing in the box so it was just sliding around in the box. Box was not marked fragile and box was on its side delivered....very lucky it wasn't broke...
customer_reviews.author: Angelo J. Shibona

customer_reviews.title: perfect.
customer_reviews.text: wonderful value! beautiful, quality, and the packaging for shipping couldn’t have been improved. this thing is HEAVY glass!
customer_reviews.author: elithea

customer_reviews.title: The package came and wrapped beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised i have 2 into one, i have a cake cover and a bowl all into one and he price was afforded. Thanks and i rate it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Chancie McRae

customer_reviews.title: Great plate set
customer_reviews.text: Love these plates. The glass is thick enough and perfect. The price was great for all the plates you get in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Strang

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose bowls
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these bowls. Thicker than I expected so durability should be excellent. Size is perfect for cereal, fruit or ice cream. All arrived in perfect condition. Were packaged very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.  Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good! It reminds me of what my grandmother used back in the day, when she made cakes! Lol
